title: The Night Warriors: The Warrior's Sin
description: Xiamara had known about vampires all her life. After all her father had been employed by The Night Warrior's for decades.What she didn't know was that as the carrier of a blood oath she would need to step up as adjustor to the most hated, cruel, psychopathic Warrior of the group. After killing his last adjustor SOB wasn't looking forward to meeting his new assistant but Fate had other plans for both of them.
author: Maggie O'Dempsey
